title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 19 January 2016 - XWiki
content:
<RodrigoPT76> has joined #xwiki  
02:53 <RodrigoPT76> has quit  
03:10 <MasterPiece> has joined #xwiki  
06:01 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
06:04 <Denis> has quit  
06:27 <MasterPiece> has quit  
06:47 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:12 <mflorea> has quit  
07:21 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
08:06 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:01 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:15 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
09:18 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
09:26 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:31 <xwikiorg\_guest\_9> has joined #xwiki  
09:31 <xwikiorg\_guest\_9> Hi  
09:34 <xwikiorg\_guest\_9> I have a problem with document tree widget : http://pastebin.com/aus46L6L  
09:35 <xwikiorg\_guest\_9> since I updated to version 7.4  
10:03 <msmeria1> has joined #xwiki  
10:03 <msmeria> has quit  
10:04 <msmeria1> is now known as <msmeria>  
10:09 <vmassol> xwikiorg\_guest\_9: hmm seems the problems is with postgresql. checking if there's a jira on this  
10:10 <vmassol> xwikiorg\_guest\_9: I think the issue might the jdbc driver you're using  
10:10 <vmassol> could you check the comments on this issue: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12940  
10:11 <vmassol> xwikiorg\_guest\_9: what version of the jdbc driver are you using?  
10:17 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:36 <lucaa> has quit  
10:36 <lucaa1> has joined #xwiki  
10:36 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:42 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:42 <RodrigoPT76> has joined #xwiki  
10:45 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:58 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
11:11 <lucaa1> has quit  
11:11 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
11:16 <lucaa> has quit  
11:58 <maya\_\_> has joined #xwiki  
12:01 <maya\_\_> has quit  
12:01 <xwikiorg\_guest\_9> vmassol: How to know what version of jdbc xwiki uses?  
12:04 <ClemensR> @xwikiorg\_guest\_9: do you mean something like:  http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Get+JDBC+Driver+Version  
12:05 <Enygma`> has quit  
12:05 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
12:05 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
12:16 <xwikiorg\_guest\_9> Thanks ClemensR  
12:16 <xwikiorg\_guest\_9> vmassol: JDBC version is PostgreSQL 9.3 JDBC4.1 (build 1104)  
12:17 <xwikiorg\_guest\_9> I'm on Debian Jessie, Postgresql 9.4  
12:24 <vmassol> xwikiorg\_guest\_9: you should checek the issue I mentioned and check the comments there, some users have succeeded fixing postgresql erros by changing the jdbc driver version. Although yours seems ok. Maybe try a more recent one that matches your postgresql version? (make sure to pick a jdbc 4.1 driver)  
12:24 <vmassol> if it still fails, I'll try to reproduce when I get some time, probably not before tomorrow though  
12:25 <vmassol> actually if you have no luck with the driver please open a jira issue at http://jira.xwiki.org with the maximum of explanations of how to reproduce and what you tried  
12:25 <vmassol> thank a lot  
12:27 <xwikiorg\_guest\_9> vmassol: ok thanks ;)  
12:33 <ClemensR> xwikiorg\_guest\_9:  it seems there is a current driver for Postgresql 9.4 at https://jdbc.postgresql.org/download.html   ... the driver for 9.3 should be compatible, though.  
12:42 <RodrigoPT76> has quit  
12:58 <Denis1> is now known as <Denis>
